titleStmt.title: Resolves of the Commons assembled in Parliament, concerning such ministers as shall preach or pray against the present government established by Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Die Lunæ, 9 Iulii, 1649. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
